mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into tabel_tree (`name`, parent_id, url, icon, `order`, title, `type`, `level`) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{order,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update tabel_tree set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `order` = #{order,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `level` = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, `name`, parent_id, url, icon, `order`, title, `type`, `level` from tabel_tree
select id, `name`, parent_id, url, icon, `order`, title, `type`, `level` from tabel_tree where level = #{level}
select * from information_schema.COLUMNS where table_name = #{tabelName} and table_schema = 'jpa';
